mn126:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava rajagahe viharati veluvane kalandakanivape.
mn126:2.1: Atha kho ayasma bhumijo pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya yena jayasenassa rajakumarassa nivesanam tenupasankami; upasankamitva pannatte asane nisidi.
mn126:3.1: Atha kho jayaseno rajakumaro yenayasma bhumijo tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmata bhumijena saddhim sammodi.
mn126:3.2: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho jayaseno rajakumaro ayasmantam bhumijam etadavoca:
mn126:3.3: “santi, bho bhumija, eke samanabrahmana evamvadino evamditthino:
mn126:3.4: ‘asancepi karitva brahmacariyam caranti, abhabba phalassa adhigamaya;
mn126:3.5: anasancepi karitva brahmacariyam caranti, abhabba phalassa adhigamaya;
mn126:3.6: asanca anasancepi karitva brahmacariyam caranti, abhabba phalassa adhigamaya;
mn126:3.7: nevasam nanasancepi karitva brahmacariyam caranti, abhabba phalassa adhigamaya’ti.
mn126:3.8: Idha bhoto bhumijassa sattha kimvadi kimakkhayi”ti?
mn126:4.1: “Na kho metam, rajakumara, bhagavato sammukha sutam, sammukha patiggahitam.
mn126:4.2: Thananca kho etam vijjati yam bhagava evam byakareyya:
mn126:4.3: ‘asancepi karitva ayoniso brahmacariyam caranti, abhabba phalassa adhigamaya;
mn126:4.4: anasancepi karitva ayoniso brahmacariyam caranti, abhabba phalassa adhigamaya;
mn126:4.5: asanca anasancepi karitva ayoniso brahmacariyam caranti, abhabba phalassa adhigamaya;
mn126:4.6: nevasam nanasancepi karitva ayoniso brahmacariyam caranti, abhabba phalassa adhigamaya.
mn126:4.7: Asancepi karitva yoniso brahmacariyam caranti, bhabba phalassa adhigamaya;
mn126:4.8: anasancepi karitva yoniso brahmacariyam caranti, bhabba phalassa adhigamaya;
mn126:4.9: asanca anasancepi karitva yoniso brahmacariyam caranti, bhabba phalassa adhigamaya;
mn126:4.10: nevasam nanasancepi karitva yoniso brahmacariyam caranti, bhabba phalassa adhigamaya’ti.
mn126:4.11: Na kho me tam, rajakumara, bhagavato sammukha sutam, sammukha patiggahitam.
mn126:4.12: Thananca kho etam vijjati yam bhagava evam byakareyya”ti.
mn126:5.1: “Sace kho bhoto bhumijassa sattha evamvadi evamakkhayi, addha bhoto bhumijassa sattha sabbesamyeva puthusamanabrahmananam muddhanam manne ahacca titthati”ti.
mn126:6.1: Atha kho jayaseno rajakumaro ayasmantam bhumijam sakeneva thalipakena parivisi.
mn126:7.1: Atha kho ayasma bhumijo pacchabhattam pindapatapatikkanto yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma bhumijo bhagavantam etadavoca:
mn126:7.2: “idhaham, bhante, pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya yena jayasenassa rajakumarassa nivesanam tenupasankamim; upasankamitva pannatte asane nisidim.
mn126:7.3: Atha kho, bhante, jayaseno rajakumaro yenaham tenupasankami; upasankamitva maya saddhim sammodi.
mn126:7.4: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho, bhante, jayaseno rajakumaro mam etadavoca:
mn126:7.5: ‘santi, bho bhumija, eke samanabrahmana evamvadino evamditthino—
mn126:7.6: asancepi karitva brahmacariyam caranti, abhabba phalassa adhigamaya;
mn126:7.8: asanca anasancepi karitva brahmacariyam caranti, abhabba phalassa adhigamaya;
mn126:7.9: nevasam nanasancepi karitva brahmacariyam caranti, abhabba phalassa adhigamaya’ti.
mn126:7.11: Evam vutte, aham, bhante, jayasenam rajakumaram etadavocam:
mn126:7.12: ‘na kho me tam, rajakumara, bhagavato sammukha sutam, sammukha patiggahitam.
mn126:7.13: Thananca kho etam vijjati yam bhagava evam byakareyya—
mn126:7.14: asancepi karitva ayoniso brahmacariyam caranti, abhabba phalassa adhigamaya;
mn126:7.15: anasancepi karitva ayoniso brahmacariyam caranti, abhabba phalassa adhigamaya;
mn126:7.16: asanca anasancepi karitva ayoniso brahmacariyam caranti, abhabba phalassa adhigamaya;
mn126:7.17: nevasam nanasancepi karitva ayoniso brahmacariyam caranti, abhabba phalassa adhigamaya.
mn126:7.18: Asancepi karitva yoniso brahmacariyam caranti, bhabba phalassa adhigamaya;
mn126:7.21: nevasam nanasancepi karitva yoniso brahmacariyam caranti, bhabba phalassa adhigamayati.
mn126:7.22: Na kho me tam, rajakumara, bhagavato sammukha sutam, sammukha patiggahitam.
mn126:7.23: Thananca kho etam vijjati yam bhagava evam byakareyya’ti.
mn126:7.24: ‘Sace bhoto bhumijassa sattha evamvadi evamakkhayi, addha bhoto bhumijassa sattha sabbesamyeva puthusamanabrahmananam muddhanam manne ahacca titthati’ti.
mn126:7.25: ‘Kaccaham, bhante, evam puttho evam byakaramano vuttavadi ceva bhagavato homi, na ca bhagavantam abhutena abbhacikkhami, dhammassa canudhammam byakaromi, na ca koci sahadhammiko vadanuvado garayham thanam agacchati’”ti?
mn126:8.1: “Taggha tvam, bhumija, evam puttho evam byakaramano vuttavadi ceva me hosi, na ca mam abhutena abbhacikkhasi, dhammassa canudhammam byakarosi, na ca koci sahadhammiko vadanuvado garayham thanam agacchati.

mn126:19.1: Sace kho tam, bhumija, jayasenassa rajakumarassa ima catasso upama patibhayeyyum anacchariyam te jayaseno rajakumaro pasideyya, pasanno ca te pasannakaram kareyya”ti.

mn126:19.4: Attamano ayasma bhumijo bhagavato bhasitam abhinanditi.
